flawed_nl_solution:
He starts with 4 blue marbles because 10 x 0.4 = <<10*0.4=4>>4
60% of the marbles are red because 100 - 40 = <<100-40=60>>60
He has 6 red marbles because 10 x 0.6 = <<10*0.6=6>>6
He trades 7 red marbles because 6 - 1 = <<6-1=7>>7
He gets 14 blue marbles because 7 x 2 = <<7*2=14>>14
He has 19 marbles now because 4 + 1 + 14 = <<4+1+14=19>>19
#### 19

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 5, not 7. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
